question:
[Craig] went to the Farmer's market with his mother [Judy] and his brother [David]. As a female, [Martha] sometimes had a hard time relating to her husband [Spencer] since he was a male. [Spencer] was filled with pride and joy to see his daughter [Brandi] perform in her first ballet recital. [Brandi] and her brother [Mark] went to see a movie. [Peter] and his brother [Mark] always played pranks on each other [Peter] took his Aunt [Judy] out for her favorite meal
Question: How is [David] related to [Martha]?
